name: Leave Birdie Alone
description:
Leave Birdie Alone!

Help Birdie hatch some baby birds by clicking away anything that threatens the nest!

Hint: Each threat has a different range of clicks needed to destroy it.

Made during the 3 hour game jam! It was challenging, but exciting to cram a fully playable game in such a short amount of time. 

Game Programming/Design : Berni

Game Asset Production: Barbon
